name: Mob Rule Classic
description: This is a dog-eat dog world of corruption, murder and sex – and as the new kid on the block you’re looking a little like ‘milk on the bone’!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista Processor: Pentium 75MHz Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: 1Mb Vesa Video graphics card Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound 2.0 Compatible sound card
